title: data model of electrolyzer
description: Model of Hydrogen Generators for Laboratories (Electrolyzer) (0-4000 cc/min)

id.description: Property. Unique ID of the object

type.description: Property. It has to be HydrogenGenerator

title.description: Property. Title of the form element

operatingTemperatureMin.description: Property. General information: Minimal operating temperature [?C]

operatingTemperatureMax.description: Property. General information: Maximal operating temperature [?C]

storageTemperatureMin.description: Property. General information: Minimal storage temperature [?C]

storageTemperatureMax.description: Property. General information: Maximal storage temperature [?C]

ingressProtection.description: Property. General information: Ingress protection (e.g. IP20)

pollutionDegreeRating.description: Property. General information: pollution degree rating (e.g. 2)

waterConsumption.description: Property. General information: How many litres of water to produce 1 litres of H2 [l]

electrolyticCell.description: Property. General information: Type of electrolytic cell (PEM, AEM)

dryingSystem.description: Property. General information: Type of drying system (e.g. PSA (Pressure Swing Adsorption))

h2Purity.description: Property. General information: H2 purity (e.g. >99.99999% referred to O2, Dew-point)

h2FlowRate.description: Property. General information: maximal H2 flow rate [cc/min]

netWeight.description: Property. General information: Net weight (water tank empty)

parallelModeCapability.description: Property. Software function: Parallel mode capability (e.g. Standard)

fillCanisterFunction.description: Property. Software function: Fill canister function (e.g. Standard)

quality.description: Property. Water: water qualtiy (e.g. Deionized, ASTM II, <0.1uS)

supplyFlowRateMin.description: Property. Water: minimal supply flow rate [l/min]

supplyFlowRateMax.description: Property. Water: minimal supply flow rate [l/min]

internalWaterTankCapacity.description: Property. Water: Internal water tank capacity [l]

connectionType.description: Property. Electrical data: Connection type (e.g. IEC320-C14)

nominalPower.description: Property. Electrical data: Maximale nominal Power [W]

fuseRating.description: Property. Electrical data: Fuse rating (5x20 mm) (e.g. 6,3A (250VAC ? T ? L / 35A))

hydrogenOutlet.description: Property. Connections: Hydrogen outlet (e.g. 1/8? Compression Fitting)

water.description: Property. Connections: Water connection (e.g. Quick Release Push in Fitting)
